00015 #include "TrafficGen.h"
00016 
00017 #include <cassert>
00018 
00019 #include "NetwControlInfo.h"
00020 #include "Packet.h"
00021 #include "BaseNetwLayer.h"
00022 #include "FindModule.h"
00023 #include "BaseWorldUtility.h"
00024 #include "ApplPkt_m.h"
00025 #include "SimpleAddress.h"
00026 
00027 Define_Module(TrafficGen);
00028 
00029 void TrafficGen::initialize(int stage)
00030 {
00031   BaseApplLayer::initialize(stage);
00032 
00033   if(stage == 0) {
00034     world           = FindModule<BaseWorldUtility*>::findGlobalModule();
00035     delayTimer      = new cMessage("delay-timer", SEND_PACKET_TIMER);
00036 
00037     packetTime      = par("packetTime");
00038     pppt            = par("packetsPerPacketTime");
00039     burstSize       = par("burstSize");
00040 
00041     nbPacketDropped = 0;
00042   } else if (stage == 1) {
00043     if(burstSize > 0) {
00044       remainingBurst = burstSize;
00045       scheduleAt(dblrand() * packetTime * burstSize / pppt, delayTimer);
00046     }
00047   } else {
00048 
00049   }
00050 }
00051 
00052 TrafficGen::~TrafficGen() {
00053   cancelAndDelete(delayTimer);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void TrafficGen::finish()
00057 {
00058   recordScalar("dropped", nbPacketDropped);
00059 }
00060 
00061 void TrafficGen::handleSelfMsg(cMessage *msg)
00062 {
00063   switch( msg->getKind() )
00064   {
00065   case SEND_PACKET_TIMER:
00066     assert(msg == delayTimer);
00067 
00068 
00069     sendBroadcast();
00070 
00071     remainingBurst--;
00072 
00073     if(remainingBurst == 0) {
00074       remainingBurst = burstSize;
00075       scheduleAt(simTime() + (dblrand()*1.4+0.3)*packetTime * burstSize / pppt, msg);
00076     } else {
00077       scheduleAt(simTime() + packetTime * 2, msg);
00078     }
00079 
00080     break;
00081   default:
00082     EV << "Unkown selfmessage! -> delete, kind: "<<msg->getKind() <<endl;
00083     delete msg;
00084     break;
00085   }
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 void TrafficGen::handleLowerMsg(cMessage *msg)
00090 {
00091   cPacket* pkt = static_cast<cPacket*>(msg);
00092   Packet p(pkt->getBitLength(), 1, 0);
00093   emit(BaseLayer::catPacketSignal, &p);
00094 
00095   delete msg;
00096   msg = 0;
00097 }
00098 
00099 
00100 void TrafficGen::sendBroadcast()
00101 {
00102   ApplPkt *pkt = new ApplPkt("BROADCAST_MESSAGE", TRAFFIC_GEN_PACKET);
00103   pkt->setDestAddr(LAddress::L3BROADCAST);
00104   // we use the host modules getIndex() as a appl address
00105   pkt->setSrcAddr( myApplAddr() );
00106   pkt->setBitLength(headerLength);
00107 
00108   // set the control info to tell the network layer the layer 3
00109   // address;
00110   NetwControlInfo::setControlInfo(pkt, LAddress::L3BROADCAST);
00111 
00112   debugEV << "Sending broadcast packet!" << endl;
00113   sendDown( pkt );
00114 }
